title: Adjust RTL track title marquee speed across Mini Player and Now Playing

requirements.summary: Update the default TrackTitleMarquee right-to-left marquee speed so animation duration reflects the new desired rate across MiniPlayer and NowPlayingScreen while preserving reduced-motion behavior and the existing duration clamp.
acceptanceCriteria: When a long track title overflows, the marquee scrolls right-to-left at the updated speed (visibly different from the previous speed).
Both `NowPlayingScreen` and `MiniPlayer` use the same updated marquee speed behavior.
Reduced-motion preference still disables the marquee animation.
The marquee continues to calculate duration from `totalDistance / speedPxPerSecond` and stays within the existing duration clamp (3s–30s).

file_operations.description: Change the default `speedPxPerSecond` prop value used by `TrackTitleMarquee` (currently 150) to the new desired rate, ensuring it remains right-to-left and continues to pass the value through to `useMarqueeMeasurements` for duration computation.

Update the hook’s default `speedPxPerSecond` (currently 150) to match the new app-wide default so any direct hook usage stays consistent, while keeping the existing `totalDistance / speedPxPerSecond` duration calculation and the 3s–30s clamp unchanged.
